welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Casorate Primo, Italy! Immerse yourself in the charm of our quaint village known for its picturesque streets, delicious local cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and savor all that our charming city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Linate Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free. No password is required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, primarily serving low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require registration or have time limits.
